fulltext:
huynhtrannhuthao@gmail.com 
0966 38 43 47 
nhuthao077 
Software Engineer 
TanBinh District, Ho Chi Minh 
A software engineer with 5 years of experience in software development, including 2.5 years working as an iOS Developer. I understand the 
importance of creating highly readable and easily maintainable source code. I am constantly enhancing knowledge and experience while 
gaining access to the latest technology. 
Huynh Tran Nhu Thao 
SKILLS  HIGHLIGHTS 
Cocoapods 
Swift  
Objective C    
xCode 
Core Data 
Core Animation 
Push Notification 
Rx-Swift  MVC  MVVM  OOP 
Git/SVN  Jira/Redmine  C++  C# 
2.5 years of full cycle development work experience with iOS 
applications. Fluency in Swift/Objective-C. 
Knowledge of and experience with OOP principles, MVC, 
MVVM programming 
Experience with iOS frameworks such as UIKit, Core Data, 
Core Animation .. 
Familiar with network programming, RESTful API, JSON, Push 
Notification. 
Experience with Rx-Swift, Facebook iOS SDK, Zenrin Map, 
Payment. 
Ability to work under high pressure, multitasking and 
organizational skills. 
A good attitude and a desire to learn. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
iOS Developer 
Cloud Nine Solutions 
11/2016 – Present 
Ho Chi Minh 
Achievements/Tasks 
- Performed in an iOS developer: analyze requirements, 
develop design documents, coding & review code, unit 
test, build and release to customer. 
- Practice in an iOS Lead developer role: support and 
coach the iOS development team including junior 
engineers, provide timelines and estimates, 
communication between team and vendors. 
- Research new technologies require in project. 
- Meeting and consulting with customer. 
- Ability to learn quickly and work under high pressure. 
- Improve teamwork and independent working skills. 
C++/C# Developer 
Global Cybersoft VietNam 
01/2014 – 10/2016 
Ho Chi Minh 
Achievements/Tasks 
- Knowledge of software development process. 
- Performed in a C++/C# developer role on window 
application: analyze requirements, develop design 
documents, coding & review code, writing test 
specification & test. 
- Improve analysis skills, coding skills, teamwork skills. 
- Ability to learn quickly and work under high pressure. 
IOS ATTENDED PROJECTS 
Itsmo Delivery (06/2018 – Present) 
- Itsmo Delivery project build an application launch in Japan to help 
shippers manage status of luggages need to delivery. The application has 
the following main functions: allows user register delivery luggages at 
specific time (AM, 12-14h, 14-16h..) and specific address, then display 
pin on the map. User can change status when delivery to 
complete/absence. It also helps user search address on map. 
Akly (02/2018 – 05/2018) 
- Akly project build an iOS application launch in Qatar. This application 
allows user orders foods, Akly then delivers the foods. It has on demand 
and subscription meal plans. It also has advanced weight management 
software and Body Mass Index calculator that will then suggest to user 
the best plans to archive them goals 
ItsumoNavi (12/2018 – 02/2018) 
- ItsumoNavi app project build an application for both Android and iOS 
launch in Japan.� This is a navigation application corresponding to 
various moving means. This application provides user the detail transit 
guidance and voice guidance like car navigation. 
FlashAir (11/2016 – 05/2018) 
- FlashAir project build an application for both Android and iOS. User can 
quickly and easily connect, download all the images and documents on 
wireless of FlashAir memory card. This application support multiple 
languages (21 languages). It also supports user to share images via 
Facebook, Twitter.. 
EDUCATION 
Computer Science 
University of Information Technology 
09/2009 – 12/2013 
6.94 
INTERESTS 
Music  Badminton  Traveling
